DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect soft tissue thickness place either single double layer acellular dermal matrix simultaneous dental implant placement . The hypothesis 2 layer acellular dermal matrix produce thicker tissue one layer .
DOC.brief_title: Implant Placement Simultaneous Soft Tissue Grafting With Single Double Layers Acellular Dermal Matrix
DOC.detailed_description: Patients must great 18 year old , pregnant , edentulous space tooth side treatment plan receive dental implant . The primary outcome measure soft tissue thickness .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion ; 1. one edentulous site border 2 teeth maxilla mandible first molar first molar treatment plan receive implant 2. least 18 year age 3. must sign informed consent The exclusion criterion include : 1. uncontrolled diabetes , immune disease , systemic disease significantly affect periodontium 2. previous head neck radiation 3. oral bisphosphonates > 3 year IV bisphosphonates 4. smoking > 1/2 pack per day tobacco habit might interfere soft tissue heal 5. requirement prophylactic antibiotic 6. allergy medication material use study , would adversely affect study procedure 7. chemotherapy previous 12 month 8. psychological problem would interfere treatment 9. patient unable unwilling sign inform consent 10. pregnancy
